rect.style: fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 4; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none;

opacity: 1; fill: url(#linearGradient3331) rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 7; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;
opacity: 1; fill: rgb(129, 217, 128); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 7; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-size: 40px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; font-family: Bitstream Vera Sans;
